name: Merge (itch) (Ibrahim Oezhan, bluefake)
description:
A game by Ibrahim Özhan, Nico Philippi and Tucker Murray, in which your objective is to get to the end as quickly as possible. While you do that, you''ll be able to COMBINE spells to form new spells that will let you kill your opponents even faster and more epic.

Made in 3 Days for the SpaceScore Jam #12
